name: Chamber no.5
description:
You wake up in a white room.  An electronic drum pulses from somewhere, and the walls close in on you with every beat.  Can you escape before it’s too late? 

This is an entry for A Game By Its Cover 2018, based on Jordan Persson's Famicase entry, Chamber no.5.

I added more narrative to the original plot which is a fun experience! It is my first time writing and there's so much that I have learned during the process. I will probably gonna write again. I really hope that you will enjoy it regardless of its flaws.

The file contains an image file "TheCode" which is an answer to the puzzle part of the game. This is just in case that you want to know the answer quickly.

Estimated Playtime: Less than 10 minutes

 Controls:

  • Mouse to choose from choices
  • Enter/Space to continue
  • ESC to skip/fast forward
